topic.title: PROCEDURE (OPCS RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE)
topic.shortdesc: PROCEDURE (OPCS RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is an OPCS-4 classification of a Patient Procedure recorded when the PATIENT is discharged from a neonatal critical care.
